# bitDepth

**Instance Property**

Number bits per pixel, or a QD/QT pixel type, for example kIO8IndexedPixelFormat, kIO32ARGBPixelFormat.

## Declaration

```swift
UInt32 bitDepth;
```
title: bitDepth
